name: Neon Boost
description:
Neon Boost is a frenetic First Person Platformer based on mechanics like Rocket-Jump or Wall-Run. Run across 3 different worlds to get the best times on the world!

Play on 3 different worlds:
  • Laser City
  • Tesla World
  • Cosmic Highway

Each world contains 12 adredaline-packed levels full of dangerous hazards and 12 special levels to test your running skills.

Run, Wall-Run, Slide, and most importantly, use your weapon to Rocket - Jump and get over the obstacles!!!Features
  • 72 levels to play
  • Leaderboards to show your records!
  • An original Synthwave-inspired soundtrack
  • Achievements!!!
  • Also, controller support (good luck)
